overview: When you read raunchy, perverted erotica online - who do you imagine behind the keyboard? Detailed descriptions of tongues drooling in eagerness, claws gripping backs. What if we told you that it was the naturally curvy Angela White, massive tits barely contained in her outfit as she types out her deepst, most perverted desires. The Brazzers benefit is also being able to show those intense, bouncing, moaning, fantastical fantasies as Angela gets sucked into a world replicating all of it.
title: Fanfriction
